system.sustained: Psyker fires flames from their mouth hitting target individual, dealing 1d10+2 E Damage, +2 Damage per Psy Rating (Pen 0) with the Flame Quality. The Psyker fires one additional flame projectile per two degrees of success on their Focus Power test, up to a maximum number equal to Psy Rating. Subsequent Flame Projectiles may hit the same target, or another within two metres that is still within range and line of sight. The Target may attempt to dodge as they would a Ranged Weapon attack.
